html: 8.28.20  2:13 am   I think I finally understand the meaning of "Long Long Long Journey". It's about going through with your plans and keep going even if you fail, right?
8.28.20  1:58 am   do you have any suggestions on how to set up your music writing area so that you can write music better?
8.28.20  1:55 am   I'm living in a house with seven other people and five dogs right now, and I'm desperately trying and failing to focus on my work. Any advice?

8.28.20  1:39 am   Oh my gosh your answer to my question about time signatures was amazing! Thank you! Another music theory question... is it better to "think" in different keys when writing music, or is it better to just start with chord relationships in a familiar key then transpose to a key that fits the emotion better? I have a hard time breaking out of C major.

8.28.20  1:37 am   So, I'm in quite the predicament. Over the summer I think that I started too many things and made too many promises that I won't be able to keep. Idk if you have any advice, but if you do what should I do?
8.28.20  1:28 am   daddy bill cam you make an egg cube in the next video
8.28.20  1:20 am   why didn't I know sooner that you made awesome music
8.28.20  1:11 am   What is the meaning of ice butter at 1:13 in might quit
8.28.20  1:07 am   What is your favorite part of the day?
8.28.20  12:44 am   Have you used the same editing software for the entirety of your "career"?

8.28.20  12:41 am   This is the third time I've somehow lost my last question. I'm going to keep a notepad to remind me to come back here right after this is answered. do you feel like there's a deeper meaning between all your songs,

      like you didn't intend to create something bigger but you accidentally did?

     Or have you been planning it all along?

      it just feels like there's a message being slowly conveyed through every song you make and I have yet to figure it out.

8.28.20  12:40 am   i feel like i become less used to everything every day. a car weighs thousands of pounds and a little metal boom box in the front makes it go several times faster than the fastest animal. i have arms and they move and flex and possess muscle contours. is that not weird? why is everything weird
8.28.20  12:36 am   Can you come up with a real sounding fake fact?
8.28.20  12:33 am   How come you sound very young in "I'm sad"
8.28.20  12:33 am   Do you know how much your music and our experiences with it mean to us?

8.28.20  12:28 am   What is ""hi" (wrong, delete)"

     was it intentional or did you accidentally say that and realized too late??
8.28.20  12:15 am   i love hearing about the failing and the succeeding of the making of your songs! do you have any more stories about them?

8.27.20  11:45 pm   When making an album, one where each song is meant to be listened to in the order they are put in,

     should each song be tonally consistent? Or is it ok for each one to feel different, as long as it's telling a story? I'd love your thought on this.
